rows.label: qst201802_0010
rows.name:
We're here now!
Everyone's back, safe and sound!

rows.label: qst201802_0020
rows.name:
Hey, come on, give us some space.
I can't breathe with all of you here like this...

rows.label: qst201802_0030
rows.name: They look pretty happy.

rows.label: qst201802_0040
rows.name: Why Phonexes make such racket though?

rows.label: qst201802_0050
rows.name:
Huh...
Yeah, I wonder.

rows.label: qst201802_0060
rows.name: Excuse me...

rows.label: qst201802_0070
rows.name: What can I do for you, Uka?

rows.label: qst201802_0080
rows.name: It's, ah...

rows.label: qst201802_0090
rows.name:
These nice Phonex folks are saying that they
want to hear our tales of adventure.

rows.label: qst201802_0100
rows.name:
Hah...
Tales of adventure, eh?

rows.label: qst201802_0110
rows.name:
It was a bit of an ordeal, wasn't it?
I say, let's let 'em hear it!

rows.label: qst201802_0120
rows.name: All right!

rows.label: qst201802_0130
rows.name:
So then we roll up to the
place where the monsters were like, ta-daa!

rows.label: qst201802_0140
rows.name:
And what do we see,
if not a big, angry-looking strong one!

rows.label: qst201802_0150
rows.name:
But I had a conversation with it first!
I conversed and conversed and conversed!

rows.label: qst201802_0160
rows.name:
Uh, "conversation" implies both sides talking...?
What you did there was more of a monologue...

rows.label: qst201802_0170
rows.name:
That right! Uka very confident in talking,
but in the end nothing come out of it.

rows.label: qst201802_0180
rows.name: N-no, you got it all wrong...

rows.label: qst201802_0190
rows.name:
It's just the monster had a short fuse
and didn't want to engage in meaningful dialog...

rows.label: qst201802_0200
rows.name:
If it was any other monster, I'm sure
I could've convinced it!

rows.label: qst201802_0210
rows.name: Oh, I'm sure...

rows.label: qst201802_0220
rows.name:
Grr!
Stop laughing!

rows.label: qst201802_0230
rows.name:
Anyway, the monster suddenly
gave me a headbutt,

rows.label: qst201802_0240
rows.name: and it hurt so much I started crying!

rows.label: qst201802_0250
rows.name: There's no talking to a brute like that...

rows.label: qst201802_0260
rows.name:
But didn't you sock him right back
after that?

rows.label: qst201802_0270
rows.name: Yeah, you did!

rows.label: qst201802_0280
rows.name:
You hit 'im so hard, all the other monsters
winced at seeing it!

rows.label: qst201802_0290
rows.name:
Yeah, that was awesome!
Good technique, right there.

rows.label: qst201802_0300
rows.name:
Y-yeah, well, right then my feelings were hurt too,
and I lost my cool...

rows.label: qst201802_0310
rows.name:
Kaku-tan and Suke-tan tried to talk sense,
but I didn't think and just went all out!

rows.label: qst201802_0320
rows.name: So then what, then what?

rows.label: qst201802_0330
rows.name: So then we went to town on those ruffians.

rows.label: qst201802_0340
rows.name:
Boom! Pow!
Yeah, we got 'em good.

rows.label: qst201802_0350
rows.name: Great win for Team Uka!

rows.label: qst201802_0360
rows.name:
Then we found and rescued this
rag-tag band of Phonex heroes!

rows.label: qst201802_0370
rows.name:
Oh?
What wrong?

rows.label: qst201802_0380
rows.name:
The denouement come too easily,
Tora disappointed by poor plot pacing.

rows.label: qst201802_0390
rows.name: Sorry, um...

rows.label: qst201802_0400
rows.name:
This Phonex and his friends are saying
*I'm* the true hero...

rows.label: qst201802_0410
rows.name: True hero?

rows.label: qst201802_0420
rows.name:
Well, since I went and saved them...
They're calling that the birth of a true hero...

rows.label: qst201802_0430
rows.name: ...What do I do?

rows.label: qst201802_0440
rows.name: Bwahaha!

rows.label: qst201802_0450
rows.name: True hero... It's got a nice ring to it!

rows.label: qst201802_0460
rows.name:
But I haven't even done anything!
I don't deserve to be called...a true hero...

rows.label: qst201802_0470
rows.name: That's not true, is it?

rows.label: qst201802_0480
rows.name:
You put your body on the line to save
all these little lives, Uka.

rows.label: qst201802_0490
rows.name: Yeah, that's right.

rows.label: qst201802_0500
rows.name:
You took a problem we didn't even realize existed,
and resolved it quickly and efficiently.

rows.label: qst201802_0510
rows.name: You make a great hero, Uka.

rows.label: qst201802_0520
rows.name: I...do...don't I...?

rows.label: qst201802_0530
rows.name:
Heheheh! ...Oh.
Maybe I shouldn't gloat, but this makes me super happy!

rows.label: qst201802_0540
rows.name:
Maybe you couldn't talk to the monsters,
but the Phonexes definitely appreciate you trying!

rows.label: qst201802_0550
rows.name: Woo!
